description:

messages.text:

Line 16: 'filepath': '\.mm$|_mac\.(cc|h)$',
E.g. also want '/cocoa/' (and possibly _posix\.(cc|h)$)

> http://codereview.chromium.org/119356/diff/1003/6

No need to add as reviewer. lgtm

subject: Add watchlist rules for src/
